The Walking Estate - A grand manor that moves with its inhabitants, taking them on a journey through time and space.
The Mobius Mansion - A house that exists in a state of perpetual rotation, causing the rooms and furniture to blend together in a psychedelic dance.
The Time Traveler's Lair - A cozy cottage that shifts between different eras, allowing its occupants to live out their wildest historical fantasies.
The House of Mirrors - A labyrinthine mansion with mirrored walls and floors, creating an endless reflection of the self and the world around it.
The Flying Castle - A soaring, aerodynamic mansion that glides through the skies, taking its inhabitants on a thrilling aerial tour of the world.
